paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Only 2 of these 11 individuals demonstrated evidence of the associated disease after analyzing 25 years of medical chart coding data during follow-up.
Only 2 of these 11 individuals demonstrated evidence of the associated disease after analyzing 25 years of medical chart coding data during follow-up.

functional_data.summary: The TTR c.424G>A variant is associated with cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is likely to segregate with disease based on familial patterns.
variants.additional_notes: The TTR variant is commonly found in patients with African ancestry.
key_quotes: Among patients initially diagnosed with HCM, 9% were found to have cardiac amyloidosis due to genetic testing.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
